name: Fxone JavaFX Application Framework
tagline: JavaFX Application Framework using completely asynchronous communications.
body:
### Welcome to FXOne
FXOne is a small UI application framework that is based on JavaFX. It uses an asynchronous message service for component interaction and CDI (Weld) for component management.

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Authors and Contributors
Contributors are always welcome, though it will require some time to get things well documented. Experience has shown that the code is quite clean and relatively simple to understand.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble? Drop me a mail or use @atsticks at Google+, I will try to help as fast as possible.
google: FXOne Java FX JavaFX Weld CDI UI framework
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
